meanings.definition: The sacred writings of a religion.
meanings.sent1: Many people find comfort in reading scriptures during difficult times.
meanings.sent2: The scriptures of this faith are passed down from generation to generation.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled coffee on the scriptures, now they have coffee stains!
meanings.sent4: Her words were like scriptures, guiding me through the darkest of days.
meanings.sent5: The scriptures contain timeless wisdom that resonates with believers.

meanings.definition: A body of writings considered sacred or authoritative.
meanings.sent1: Scholars study various scriptures to understand different cultural beliefs.
meanings.sent2: The ancient scriptures provide insights into the values of past civilizations.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over the shelf, causing a cascade of scriptures to fall on the floor!
meanings.sent4: In her eyes, his love letters were as precious as scriptures.
meanings.sent5: The scriptures hold the key to unlocking the mysteries of the universe.
